languages.text: "Доложи. Только так, чтобы я понял{mf||а}. Не более одной техномудрости на пять предложений".

traits.locale_text: "Доложи. Только так, чтобы я понял{mf||а}. Не более одной техномудрости на пять предложений".

languages.text: "Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."
languages.original_text: "Доложи. Только так, чтобы я понял{mf||а}. Не более одной техномудрости на пять предложений".

traits.locale_text: "Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."
"Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."
"Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."
"Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."
"Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."

languages.text: 「私が理解できるように報告せよ。理解できる人類の言葉で5行につき技術知識1パール以内だ」
languages.original_text: "Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."

traits.locale_text: 「私が理解できるように報告せよ。理解できる人類の言葉で5行につき技術知識1パール以内だ」

languages.text: “以我能听懂的方式提交你的报告。每五句能听得懂的人话里，不准超过一句涉及技术知识的内容。”
languages.original_text: "Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."

traits.locale_text: “以我能听懂的方式提交你的报告。每五句能听得懂的人话里，不准超过一句涉及技术知识的内容。”

languages.text: "Berichtet. Aber so, dass ich es verstehe. Höchstens eine Perle Tech-Weisheit je fünf Sätze verständlicher menschlicher Sprache."
languages.original_text: "Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."

traits.locale_text: "Berichtet. Aber so, dass ich es verstehe. Höchstens eine Perle Tech-Weisheit je fünf Sätze verständlicher menschlicher Sprache."

languages.text: « Faites votre rapport, mais veillez à ce qu'il soit compréhensible. Limitez-vous à un concept technosage pour cinq énoncés humainement intelligibles. »
languages.original_text: "Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."

traits.locale_text: « Faites votre rapport, mais veillez à ce qu'il soit compréhensible. Limitez-vous à un concept technosage pour cinq énoncés humainement intelligibles. »

languages.text: «Presente su informe, pero hágalo en términos que yo pueda entender. No suelte más de una perla de tecnosapiencia por cada cinco frases de discurso inteligible para los humanos».
languages.original_text: "Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."

traits.locale_text: «Presente su informe, pero hágalo en términos que yo pueda entender. No suelte más de una perla de tecnosapiencia por cada cinco frases de discurso inteligible para los humanos».

languages.text: "Raporunu anlayabileceğim biçimde ilet. İnsanların anlayabileceği her beş cümleye karşın en fazla bir tekno irfan ifadesi kullan."
languages.original_text: "Deliver your report, just do so in a way I can understand. No more than one pearl of tech-wisdom per five sentences of intelligible human speech."

traits.locale_text: "Raporunu anlayabileceğim biçimde ilet. Anlaşılır insani konuşmaya göre, her beş cümlede bir en fazla bir tekno irfan tanesi kullanabilirsin."
